snippet: Rafael Nadal rebounded from an early break to beat Marcel Granollers, 6-3, 6-2, advancing to the third round of the Barcelona Open in Spain....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal rebounded from an early break to beat Marcel Granollers, 6-3, 6-2, advancing to the third round of the Barcelona Open in Spain.
abstract: Rafael Nadal beats Marcel Granollers, advancing to third round of Barcelona Open; other tennis scores noted.
